name: Vasantha Kumar
title: Data Engineer | Python Developer
about: I am a Data Engineer and Python Developer, passionate about Flask, Data, and Automation. I specialize in designing scalable backend systems, building efficient data pipelines, and developing automated solutions that transform raw data into actionable insights.

projects.name: Project – 916 Event Management
projects.desc: The Event Management Application is a web-based platform developed using Python (Flask) with MySQL as the backend. The app is designed to streamline the entire event lifecycle — from planning and registration to scheduling and reporting.
